author: Jim Acosta and Kaitlan Collins, CNN
title: Heated disagreement breaks out in Situation Room over hydroxychloroquine
description: There was a heated disagreement in the Situation Room this weekend over the efficacy of the anti-malaria drug hydroxychloroquine -- but multiple sources say it was mostly one-sided, as President Donald Trump's top trade adviser Peter Navarro feuded with other…
